pkgmetadata.longdescription:
A pure-Python tiling window manager.
Features ========
* Simple, small and extensible. It's easy to write your own layouts, widgets and commands. * Configured in Python. * Command shell that allow all aspects of Qtile to be managed and inspected. * Complete remote scriptability - write scripts to set up workspaces, manipulate windows, update status bar widgets and more. * Qtile's remote scriptability makes it one fo the most thoroughly unit-tested window managers around.
